label: Wizard U Trophy Room 5
description:
Having determined the wards have not been tripped, but that some "wrong" magic was executed here, he pulls up a few spells to help him reconstruct the crime.

Hit 1 to cast the "Time Reconstruction" spell.
Hit 2 to cast the "Audio Deverberation" spell.
Hit 3 to cast the "Hand of Touching" spell.

Hit 0 to quit.
